items.title: TITAN TECHNOLOGY WELCOMES ESTONIAN ICT DELEGATION
items.description: Titan Technology hosted a prominent delegation from Estonia’s ICT sector, marking the delegation's inaugural visit to Vietnam with engaging discussions and partnership opportunities.

items.title: BLOOD DONATION – ROSE DROPS OF LOVE
items.description: On the morning of May 20th, at the Lam Son’s office, Titan in collaboration with the Ho Chi Minh Blood Donation Center organized a meaningful blood donation campaign.
